    • Method Detail

      • resourceOffers

        public java.util.Collection<OfferID> resourceOffers(SchedulerDriver driver,
                                                    java.util.List<Offer> offers,
                                                    java.util.Collection<? extends Block> blocks)
        Description copied from interface: PlanScheduler
        Processes the provided offers using the provided driver against the provided block. block should be whatever block is currently the next pending block in the current plan, but may also be null.
        Specified by:
        resourceOffers in interface PlanScheduler
        Returns:
        a list of zero or more of the provided offers which were accepted to fulfill offer requirements returned by the block
